EmbeddedServiceCustomComponent.name: EmbeddedServiceCustomComponent
EmbeddedServiceCustomComponent.description: Represents a custom component created for an Embedded Service feature.

CustomComponentId.description: The unique ID of the LightningComponentBundle or AuraDefinitionBundle component to be used in the Embedded Service.

CustomComponentType.description: The embedded component type associated with the chosen Feature that you want to customize. The possible values are: LA_ChatHeader—Not supported for AuraDefinitionBundle components LA_Minimized LA_PlainTextChatMessage—Not supported for AuraDefinitionBundle components LA_Prechat

EmbeddedServiceConfigId.description: The unique ID of the EmbeddedServiceConfig object that this custom component is associated with.

Feature.description: The Embedded Service feature that uses the custom component. The possible values are: Base ChannelMenu FieldService Flows LiveAgent NotInUse
